content: free egg beret pattern this pattern is adjustable so no matter what yarn you use you should be able to make one for yourself <3 feel free to message me if you need help on the pattern via my instagram @y o h plus or facebook @yarn over hook 1 no reselling or redistributing this pattern i worked really hard to make this pattern and i hope as fellow crafters you would respect that this is my design and would not take it as yours 2 please do not reuse my photos 3 no video tutorials on how to do this pattern there s one for this one already https //youtu be/0m-8mk86pyi 4 you can sell the finished product of this pattern but please don t forget to give proper credit 5 do not share screenshots or videos of this pattern except for the cover page 6 lastly have fun making it yarn white acrylic yarn size 4 yellow acrylic yarn size 4 crochet hook 5 00mm for beret 5 5mm for ribbing
